## Candidate.toHistory() method

Appends the message generated by this candidate to the messages already present in the generation request. The result of this method can be safely serialized to JSON for persistence in a database.

**Signature:**

```typescript
toHistory(): MessageData[];
```
**Returns:**

MessageData\[\]

A serializable list of messages compatible with `generate({history})`<!-- -->.
